data.name: IATI
data.description: The budget identifier reported uses IATI budget identifier categories

data.name: Country Chart of Accounts
data.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to the recipient country chart of accounts

data.name: Other Country System
data.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to a recipient country system other than the chart of accounts

data.name: Reporting Organisation
data.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to categories that are specific to the reporting organisation

data.name: Other
data.description: The budget identifier reported uses a different vocabulary, not specified in the codelist
